Text.val: If there was an error, create an error message
This would normally be added to a log or shown to the user
The translation can be a global function, because standard messages are used for the XML Functions.

STP.TXT: Here provided path /AddressBoo[1]/Contact[1] does not exist
Array without index is invalid for modify

TXT.val: Index Used In Path Is Invalid

STP.TXT: Here index used in path is invalid i.e. /AddressBook[1]
Here used JSON Source variable is '???'VAR
Here JSON Source variable argument is not of JSON Type it is provided as Alpha
Here JSON Variable is updated with NULL
Here Contact array used but without the index
Here trying to insert alrady exist key Record_ID
Here index or array is used for single instance
Here both array in path and Key is used as a argument
Here Record_ID is not an array
Inserted Single Object as NickName in 1st contact
Modified the 3rd element of Contact Array with the new array value

Text.val: Convert the file to a blob, since the tester is working with blob
Move it back to disk, so the changes are saved

Text.valUnicode: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red255\green0\blue128;} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\cf1\b\f0\fs20 JSON Error Codes\cf0\par -0 Function executed successfully\par -1 Path does not exist\par -2 Key does not exist in JSON source variable\par -3 Key already exists in JSON source variable\par -4 Index used in path is invalid\par -5 Error occurred while parsing JSON file\par -6 Referred parameter does not exist\par -7 Provided source variable is of type non-JSON\par -8 Provided JSON source variable is NULL\par -9 Object path refers to array without index\par -10 Single instance path is not allowed\par -11 Matching object/array is not found in JSON source variable\par -12 Index or [] was used with single instance (object)\par -13 Either path pointing to array or a key is allowed for insert\par -14 Array being referred does not exist\par }
